original_text: And in all the land there were no women so beautiful as Job's daughters. And their father gave them an inheritance among their brothers.
korean_text: 모든 땅에서 욥의 딸들처럼 아리따운 여자가 없었더라 그들의 아버지가 그들에게 그들의 오라비들처럼 기업을 주었더라

sentences.original_text: there were no women so beautiful as Job's daughters.
gave them an inheritance among their brothers.
